name: Platformer With No Title
description:
1. Our game has no real story. It is essentially meant for speedrunning, hence the timer. Complete each level as fast as you can, and record your times. In each level, you must find the green button and press it to stop the timer. You will then be prompted to go to the next level whenever you wish, your other option being to stay and explore.
  2. The game contains these already, but I can put them here again
    1. A and D to move your character
    2. Space to jump, hold it to go higher
    3. S to crouch; if you try to stand up in a tight space, you will automatically stay crouched
    4. ONLY in the air, left click to dash; direction is inputted using WASD
    5. Esc to pause
